description.raw:
I noticed a weird failure that I bisected to pull request #629

[![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ign_physics-pr-win&build=33)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_physics-pr-win/33/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_physics-pr-win/33/

~~~
The system cannot find the batch label specified - get_source_from_gazebodistro
~~~

It was perplexing because that PR didn't touch the label, but it seems to have triggered a bug that hits only sometimes when you have unix line endings in a batch

* https://web.archive.org/web/20160305063042/help.wugnet.com/windows/system-find-batch-label-ftopict615555.html

so to be safe I converted the line endings to dos for all our batch files

It was perplexing because that PR didn't touch the label, but it seems to have triggered a bug that hits only sometimes when you have unix line endings in a batch

  • https://web.archive.org/web/20160305063042/help.wugnet.com/windows/system-find-batch-label-ftopict615555.html

so to be safe I converted the line endings to dos for all our batch files

title.raw: use unix2dos to give dos line endings to all bat files
title.html: use unix2dos to give dos line endings to all bat files
